これはバーニーです。健康な友達です。
これはダイアナです。健康な友達です。

Heart health is related to blood pressure and LDL.
Heart is normal.
Low blood pressure and cholesterol levels mean a healthy circulatory system.
Heart has trouble pumping blood.
Rising blood pressure and cholesterol will start damaging arteries that can lead to clogging.
High blood pressure and cholesterol will clog the blood pressure and cause problems sucha s stroke, heart attack, etc.
Arteries have high chance of clogging, potentials for heart attacks.
Liver health is related to BMI and LDL.
Liver is normal.
With a slim body and low LDL levels the liver has no problems.
Liver is in the process of fatty liver.
A larger waist and rising LDL means the liver is accumulating fat.
Fatty liver has formed.
Obesity and persistent high LDL cause fat to accumulate in the liver and leads to fatty liver.
Kindey health is related to blood pressure and glucose.
Kidney is normal.
With low blood pressure and low glucose allows the kidney to filter toxins out of the blood.
Kidney is in process of diabetes.
Rising blood pressure and glucose starts to impair kidney function to filter toxins.
Persistent high blood pressure and high glucosee levels have led to kidney damage and the kidney stops filtering toxins, causing diabetes.
Kidney is experiencing diabetes.
This is a blood vessel with red cells flowing through. As the person's health gets worse, the vessel might get clogged, preventing cells to flow.

Tutorials.Item: To interact with different AR components, such as buttons, simply click them on the screen.

Activities gives you a high-level view of the figure's health by simulating the figure's motion capabilities. You can see the character and his/her healthy friend working together. Use the slider bar and media buttons to see how they will behave in the future.
Internals simulate what happens inside the figure's organs. We will focus on three organs: heart, liver, and kidney. Click on the labels beside the organs to zoom in for closer inspection.
